publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3323 Nicola Sturgeon: Glasgow Acute Services Review-That the Parliament notes the outcome of the acute services review in Glasgow; welcomes the proposed £700 million investment in hospital services; expresses concern about aspects of the review, including the proposed number and location of in-patient hospitals and the planned reduction of accident and emergency departments from five to two, and calls on the Scottish Executive to reconsider its approval of Greater Glasgow NHS Board's proposals.Supported by: Ms Sandra White*, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-3323 Nicola Sturgeon: Glasgow Acute Services Review—That the Parliament notes the outcome of the acute services review in Glasgow; welcomes the proposed £700 million investment in hospital services; expresses concern about aspects of the review, including the proposed number and location of in-patient hospitals and the planned reduction of accident and emergency departments from five to two, and calls on the Scottish Executive to reconsider its approval of Greater Glasgow NHS Board’s proposals.Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Linda Fabiani
S1M-3323 Glasgow Acute Services Review (lodged on 23 August 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
